backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing party ledger with payment tracking, location-based visit records, shop branding, user profiles, and access control using mixins for authorization and blob storage.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old user profiles from Text to structured {name: Text} format and removes staffAccounts during upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting test requirements for PartyFormDialog authorization and party creation functionality with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files describing authentication flow, React Query hooks, utility functions, UI components, and page layouts.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme color schemes including sidebar, chart, and destructive colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Party Ledger application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring React Query, TanStack Router with routes for dashboard/parties/reports/settings/visits, theme provider, and actor session context.
frontend/src/components/admin/AddAdminPr: Dialog component for adding admin principals with Principal ID validation, form submission, and error handling using useAddAdminPrincipal mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPrinc: Admin panel displaying list of admin principals with add/remove functionality, current user highlighting, and confirmation dialogs for removal actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/StaffManag: Component for managing staff accounts (content truncated in provided source).
frontend/src/components/alerts/DueTodayD: Dialog component that displays parties with payments due today, allowing users to view individual party details by navigating to the party page.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Full-screen component that displays an access denied message with an optional custom reason when users lack required permissions.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Error screen shown when application initialization fails, providing retry and reload options to recover from network or bootstrap issues.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Landing page with Internet Identity login button for authenticating users into the Party Ledger application.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Error screen displayed when user profile loading fails, offering retry and reload functionality.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name for profile setup, preventing dismissal until completed.
frontend/src/components/auth/ResetAdminP: Empty file placeholder for admin password reset dialog component.
frontend/src/components/auth/StaffLoginS: Empty file placeholder for staff-specific login screen component.
frontend/src/components/auth/StartupLoad: Simple loading screen with spinner and customizable message displayed during application startup.
frontend/src/components/auth/TopLevelErr: React error boundary that catches top-level errors and displays a self-contained error UI with reload functionality, independent of app providers.
frontend/src/components/branding/Brandin: Header component displaying shop logo and name from branding settings, with fallback to default Party Ledger branding.
Settings card allowing admins to customize shop name and upload a logo image with progress tracking and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/import/ExcelPart: Card component for bulk importing parties from Excel files, with preview, batch processing, progress tracking, and detailed success/failure reporting.
Main application shell component providing navigation, header with branding, logout functionality, and footer. Includes navigation items for Dashboard, Parties, New Visit, Reports, and Settings.
frontend/src/components/parties/PartyFor: Dialog form for adding or editing party records with fields for name, address, phone, PAN, and due amount. Handles party ID generation and validation with detailed logging for debugging.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Dialog form for recording payments with amount, comment, and optional next payment date fields. Requires next payment date when amount is zero.
Displays a list of payment records with metadata including payment ID, next payment date indicator, and location saved status. Shows empty state when no payments exist.
frontend/src/components/settings/Princip: Card component displaying the user's Internet Identity Principal ID with copy-to-clipboard functionality. Used for sharing with administrators for access grants.
frontend/src/components/transfer/JsonTra: Card component for exporting and importing application data as JSON files. Supports merge or overwrite modes for imports.
frontend/src/components/visits/PartyVisi: Dialog form for recording party visits with payment amount, comment, visit date/time, next payment date, and automatic geolocation capture. Handles location permission states and validates required fields.
frontend/src/context/ActorSessionContext: Provides React context for managing backend actor session state, including authentication status, loading states, and a stable principal key for query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminPrinc: React Query hooks for managing admin principals (get, add, remove) and checking caller admin status, with temporary type casting until backend interface is regenerated.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuth.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile (name) with caching and invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useBranding.t: React Query hooks for getting and setting shop branding (name and logo) with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useParties.ts: React Query hooks for party management including fetching all parties, individual party details, validating/generating party IDs, and adding parties with detailed error logging.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePayments.t: React Query hooks for fetching party visit records and recording payments or visits with location data, invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStaffPermi: Stub implementation returning null data as staff authentication has been removed from the application.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTodayDashb: React Query hook that aggregates today's party visits across all parties, calculating total count and amount with automatic refresh every minute.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTransfer.t: React Query hooks for exporting and importing upgrade data with cache invalidation of all data queries on import.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorSafe.ts: Simplified React Query hook for creating backend actor with authentication, without automatic query invalidation side effects, including retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useDueTodayAlert.ts: Simplified hook for managing due-today alerts, currently disabled to avoid performance issues, with placeholder state for parties due today and dismiss functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components like cards, buttons, borders, and charts.
frontend/src/lib/excel/parsePartiesFromE: CSV parser that reads party data from uploaded files, validates required fields (Party Name, PAN), optional fields (address, phone, due amount), and returns parsed parties with error messages for invalid rows.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting and parsing monetary amounts in Indian Rupees, phone numbers, and PAN numbers with locale-specific formatting.
frontend/src/lib/phone.ts: Helper functions to normalize phone numbers and create tel: links for clickable phone numbers.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Time conversion utilities between JavaScript Date objects and ICP Time (nanoseconds), plus formatting functions for datetime-local inputs and display strings.
frontend/src/lib/transfer/jsonTransfer.t: Functions to export/import UpgradeData as JSON files with bigint serialization, and merge imported data with existing parties and visit records.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page displaying today's visit summary with total count and collected amount, plus a list of individual visits with party details and navigation to party pages.
frontend/src/pages/NewPartyVisitPage.tsx: Page for creating new party visits with searchable party list (by name, phone, PAN) and dialog to record visit details when a party is selected.
frontend/src/pages/PartiesPage.tsx: Displays a searchable list of parties with their basic info (name, phone, PAN, due amount) in a card grid layout. Includes an 'Add Party' button that opens a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/PartyDetailsPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a single party including contact details, due amount, and payment history. Provides actions to edit, delete, add payments, and record visits.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Displays payment analytics and history for a selected party, showing party summary statistics and latest payment details with visit information.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Tabbed settings interface with sections for profile, branding, data import from Excel, JSON data transfer, and an admin panel (visible only to admins).
frontend/src/pages/VisitDetailsPage.tsx: Shows detailed information about a specific party visit/payment record including amount, date/time, location, comments, and next payment date.
frontend/src/utils/staffSession.ts: Empty utility file, likely intended for staff session management functionality.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom theme colors using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, Inter font family, accordion animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting a fix request to remove authentication guards from party ID generation endpoints, with pending feature requests to eliminate staff authentication requirements from backend party management functions.
